list: Provides general legal guidance based on Colombian and US regulations

ip.title: 4. Intellectual Property
ip.desc: All generated documents are the property of the user. The technology, brand, and contents of the platform are the exclusive property of TuAvocado SAS.

modifications.title: 5. Modifications
modifications.desc: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Significant changes will be notified by email.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.desc: We use essential cookies for platform operation, analytical cookies (Google Analytics) to improve user experience, and preference cookies to remember your settings.

security.title: Information Security
list: Restricted access to data under least privilege principle

sharing.title: Sharing with Third Parties
sharing.desc: <0>We do NOT sell</0> your personal data. We only share information with:

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.desc: We retain your data while you maintain an active account or as required by law. You can request the deletion of your account and associated data at any time.
